text: Need Brooklyn Edwards for Lush campaign. Budget around $14,086, looking for 1 x Instagram post, 1 x Pinterest pin, 1 x Instagram post, 1 x Media interview, 2 x Product launch event. 2 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs December 2025. Usage rights for 8 months. Engagement period: 5 months. Need to confirm: deliverables
